stories.title: List of Exploits Found by AIs

stories.text:
We're building a time-tracking and billing automation product for the legal market, but we've heard from several of our freelance contractors that it would be useful for them too.

The tool connects to Word, GDocs, Outlook, Gmail, Chrome etc. and tracks time that you spent for every project, without requiring you to start/stop timers - you can assign a document/email/research session to a client and a project with one click.

In the end, you can generate personalized invoices directly from the app, where you can also introduce a Stripe/PayPal link to get paid faster.

The goal is to help freelancers to get paid in full, because they can actually prove how much they worked, and on what projects.

Any feedback would be appreciated! Thanks!
